data.name: Fractured Space - Armada Pack (31 Launch Ships)
data.detailed_description:
The Armada Pack

The Ultimate Value Pack for new Fractured Space players. Get the Armada Pack and unlock and own the original 31 ships available at the launch of the game. Excludes ships released after Sep/30/2016.

You get these ships:

USR
Pioneer
Colossus
Disruptor
Brawler
Destroyer
Black Widow
Watchman
Ghost
Displacer
Guardian
Ranger

Zarek
Venturer
Hunter
Enforcer
Gladiator
Infiltrator
Raider
Overseer
Paragon
Superlifter

Titan
Sentinel
Protector
Reaper
Interceptor
Leviathan
Raven
Basilisk
Equalizer
Persecutor
Paladin
Executioner

7 Days of Credit Boost

Doubles your base Credits earned in every game!

Exclusive Black Edition Skins for:

  • Gladiator
  • Enforcer
  • Black Widow
  • Guardian
  • Executioner
  • Leviathan

    This pack does not give access to any ships released after September 30 2016.

data.short_description: The Ultimate Value Pack for new Fractured Space players. Get the Armada Pack and unlock and own the original31 ships available at the launch of the game. Excludes ships released after Sep/30/2016. You also get six exclusive Black Edition skins and 7 days of double credit boost!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: (64 bit only at present) Windows 7 SP1 (must have KB 2670838 installed) / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 2.3+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported chipsets: NVIDIA 470 GTX or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required. We'll be constantly updating the game to lower the required specs, so bear with us if your machine is struggling.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: (64 bit only at present) Windows 7 SP1/Windows 8 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported chipsets: NVIDIA 470 GTX or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required. We'll be constantly updating the game to lower the required specs, so bear with us if your machine is struggling.
